briefTitle: Safety and Tolerability of Intravenous VIT-45 in Patients With Iron Deficiency Anemia
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Blinded, Placebo Controlled, Cross-Over Study to Investigate the Safety and Tolerability of Intravenous VIT-45 in Patients With Iron Deficiency Anemia

arms.label: VIT-45 on Day 0, then Placebo on Day 7
Placebo on Day 0, then VIT-45 on Day 7

summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of VIT-45 in the treatment of Iron Deficiency Anemia

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-emergent Adverse Events During Each 7-day Study Period
